meanings.definition: Forming a mental image or picture
meanings.sent1: She had a visualising mind that could imagine anything vividly.
meanings.sent2: The artist's visualising abilities helped her create beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent3: His visualising imagination made him believe in magical creatures.
meanings.sent4: The visualising power of her memory was like a movie playing in her head.
meanings.sent5: The visualising process made the concept crystal clear in her mind.

meanings.definition: Making something visible in the mind
meanings.sent1: Visualising the scene, she could almost smell the flowers in her mind.
meanings.sent2: He was visualising his dream vacation while sitting at his desk.
meanings.sent3: Visualising the exam questions before the test helped calm her nerves.
meanings.sent4: She was visualising success as if it were already within her grasp.
meanings.sent5: Visualising the finish line motivated him to keep running.

meanings.definition: Creating a visual representation of something
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer was visualising the logo for the new company.
meanings.sent2: Visualising the data in a chart made it easier to understand.
meanings.sent3: She was visualising a world where everyone communicated through drawings.
meanings.sent4: Visualising the future of technology, she saw endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The artist was visualising a masterpiece in her mind before putting brush to canvas.
